name: adc_ltm_node_list
scriptContent:
from appviewx import db_connection
connect_db = db_connection()

def getLTMNodeList():
    '''
    to get the list of LTM node

    '''

    ltm_node_list = []
    adc_ltm_node_list = connect_db.appviewx.ln.find()
    for device in adc_ltm_node_list:
        ltm_node_list.append(device)
    return ltm_node_list
description: To get a list of LTM node
_keywords: To get a list of LTM node
